Post.title: libpng warning iccp known incorrect
Post.raw:
---
title: libpng warning iccp known incorrect
tags: ['libpng', 'iccp', '']
date: 2021-01-28 19:38:33
category: 
description: ': libpngwarning'
top: false
---

> [https://blog.51cto.com/xvjunjie/2348645](https://blog.51cto.com/xvjunjie/2348645), [, ](https://blog.51cto.com/xvjunjie/2563261)

# libpng

```bash
wget https://sourceforge.net/projects/libpng/files/libpng16/1.6.36/libpng-1.6.36.tar.xz
```

# `png.c`

```c
if (png_sRGB_checks[i].is_broken != 0)
{
     /* These profiles are known to have bad data that may cause
        * problems if they are used, therefore attempt to
        * discourage their use, skip the 'have_md5' warning below,
        * which is made irrelevant by this error.
        */
     // 
     // png_chunk_report(png_ptr, "known incorrect sRGB profile",
     //     PNG_CHUNK_ERROR);
}
```

# 

> Ubuntu, 

```bash
sudo apt install zlib* -y
sudo apt install gcc make cmake -y
./configure && make -j && sudo make install
```
